channel.title: ★ Zelix | Instant-PK & Trained | Amazing Combat | Strong Eco-PK ★
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[URL=http://http://zelix.net/] [img]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/play_zps3duq7tda.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/ok_01_zpsdqg8hg4s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/ok_02_zpstvphrm2y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/ok_03_zpsgcj8tuny.png[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/ok_04_zpslxeyv5ux.png[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/ok_05_zpsh5qm4fzo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/ok_06_zpso8muwwub.png[/img]
[img]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/play_zps3duq7tda.png[/img] [/URL]
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/M_zpsjacftrfc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/u_zpsty2ttpxg.png[/img]
[B]Players that join this weekend will receive a starter package. Each package gifts the player 3 random items and and PKP and EXP Boosts.[/B] - Buffed casket drop rates. - Buffed Jad. - Green dragons now always drop dragon bones. - The dragon mace and dragon longsword have received a special attack buff. - All of the items in Sergeant Damien's shop are now free. - The tracker now has a sweet-looking animation when used. (It's in your bank check it out!) - There are some new log in messages to help people out! - Eating has been slightly tweaked - Revenants have been buffed. - Revenants no longer drop corrupt PVP armour. Meaning the armours are no longer permenant. You'll have to go to Nomad for that. - The items in the PKP shop are now cheaper. - Some PKP rewards have been moved to Sergeant Damien's shop, where everything is free. - Announcements have been adjusted. - Special attack now regens twice as fast. We will tweak how this occurs in future. - Staves now attack correctly. - Revenants are now in multi! - The slayer portal to reach slayer tasks now provides more useful information. - Ghostly has been added to the banks of trained account's [/CENTER]

item.title: ★ Zelix | Instant-PK & Trained | Amazing Combat | Strong Eco-PK ★
item.dc:creator: @zelix_rsps zelix rsps
item.description:
@zelix_rsps wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:3, topic:553360”]I like your non-professional attitude to the server. It’s actually funny nowadays that all these servers trying to portray this image of being “professional” when the owners are really just 12 year old kids with a sense of authority who have no clue how to code. It’s an illegal RuneScape emulation lol.

Goodluck with the server.[/quote]

Thank you for the comment,
And I have to completely agree to this comment. We do however take good care of our player by providing almost instant support. Hope to see you in-game!

Read full topic

item.title: ★ Zelix | Instant-PK & Trained | Amazing Combat | Strong Eco-PK ★
item.dc:creator: @zelix_rsps zelix rsps
item.description:
@zelix_rsps wrote:

[CENTER]

[URL=http://http://zelix.net/]







[/URL]

[B]Players that join this weekend will receive a starter package. Each package gifts the player 3 random items and and PKP and EXP Boosts.[/B]

  • Buffed casket drop rates.
  • Buffed Jad.
  • Green dragons now always drop dragon bones.
  • The dragon mace and dragon longsword have received a special attack buff.
  • All of the items in Sergeant Damien’s shop are now free.
  • The tracker now has a sweet-looking animation when used. (It’s in your bank check it out!)
  • There are some new log in messages to help people out!
  • Eating has been slightly tweaked
  • Revenants have been buffed.
  • Revenants no longer drop corrupt PVP armour. Meaning the armours are no longer permenant. You’ll have to go to Nomad for that.
  • The items in the PKP shop are now cheaper.
  • Some PKP rewards have been moved to Sergeant Damien’s shop, where everything is free.
  • Announcements have been adjusted.
  • Special attack now regens twice as fast. We will tweak how this occurs in future.
  • Staves now attack correctly.
  • Revenants are now in multi!
  • The slayer portal to reach slayer tasks now provides more useful information.
  • Ghostly has been added to the banks of trained account’s
    [/CENTER]
